* BrightBlade whined a bit as she pressed her hurt foot against the ground, 
walking hurt but as long as it got her away from that hussy she really 
didn't give a nano!
She looked back quickly over her shoulder to see if Gangon was following and 
saw Lightmare kiss him again, obviously he had made his choice and had 
chosen the new bot as his new partner.
She then looked ahead again and continued to limp towards the base, if he 
wanted her then that was just fine with her...sort of.
BrightBlade liked Gangon as her partner, of course he acted funny sometimes 
but that was just the way he was...it even made her laugh at times too. She 
admitted that she would miss him and his comments on her looks but she 
couldn't compete with a bot who literally threw herself in his arms, a male 
couldn't resist that...most.
She had lost even without trying, but she wasn't about to admit it. That 
just wasn't her way of doing things. She would brood about it on her own 
time, as she had about other things that had caused her to become stressed.
BrightBlade then opened her com-link to Gangon.*

" I'll just leave you and...your new partner to your...amusements. See ya 
back at base."

* The last sentence was a bit bitter and harsh but she really didn't care, 
as long as she was understood.
She then walked away from the direct approach towards the base and soon 
began to take the longer way, a way that would give her enough time to 
think.And a way that would give her great distance from the...pair.*
